name: Triangle Threads Storefront
description: Customized a Shopify theme using CSS and Liquid code to align with the client's vision for their e-commerce shop.

name: Find It: Futurama
description: This project combines backend and frontend functionality to create an interactive "Where's Waldo?"-style game. Users search for hidden characters in an image, receive feedback, and track their scores.

name: Frootie Inventory App
description: A full-featured CRUD app for managing inventory, allowing users to view, add, remove, and categorize items. Includes search and sorting functionality by name or price.

name: The Member Ship
description: A Node.js/Express app with password encryption using bcrypt and authentication via Passport. Only members can access the message board, while only admins can delete messages.

name: Weather Bee
description: A weather app that displays the forecast for a given location. The theme adjusts based on whether itâ€™s day or night at the location, and users can toggle between Fahrenheit and Celsius.

name: Resume Builder
description: A resume builder that gathers key information from the user and formats it into a professional 8.5 x 11 layout. Once completed, users can download their resume as a PDF.

name: Jaquette Storefront
description: A small shopping app made with React as a part of the Odin Project curriculum. Uses routing, state, and various componenets to emulate a shopping experience for users on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
